job.title: Sr Prin Eng, Systems Engrg
job.description: Raytheon is a premier engineering company which provides technical solutions in software development and systems engineering that address security challenges and strengthen our customers Raytheon hires industryleading professionals and we treat them like industryleading professionals We bring exceptional talent to an array of missions that includes computer network operations vulnerabilities characterization information assurance and emerging technologies to expand cybersecurity solutions Job Description The Sr Principle Systems Engineer will guide users in formulating requirements and advise alternative approaches and conduct feasibility studies Will be responsible for analyzing user requirements concept of operations documents and high level system architectures to develop system requirements and specifications The Systems Engineering will provide technical leadership for the integration of requirements design and technology and guide system development and implementation planning through assessment or preparation of system engineering management plans and system integration and test plans Ultimately responsible for the technical integrity of work performed and deliverables associated with the Systems Engineering area of responsibility for one of the Governments Analytic Modernization Programs whose primary purpose is to enable Analyst Workflows through Visualization and Presentation Capabilities including Applications Work environments include EU2 Virtual Desktop MACHINESHOP Atlassian Stack OpenShift Rancher and Docker Requirements Twenty 20 years in a technical role in projects and programs for Government or Industry customers Demonstrated experience in planning and leading Systems Engineering efforts is required Twelve 12 years experience as a Systems Engineer in programs that encompass system architecture requirements analysis process execution and evaluation Eight 8 years experience providing technical direction for the development engineering integration and testing of complex hardwaresoftware systems Bachelors degree in System Engineering Computer Science Information Systems Engineering Science Engineering Management or related discipline from an accredited college or university is required Five 5 years of additional SE experience may be substituted for a bachelors degree Must have current TSSCI with polygraph 171202 Raytheon is an Equal OpportunityAffirmative Action employer All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race color religion creed sex sexual orientation gender orientation gender identity national origin disability or protected Veteran status
